description: Splits selected Hangul text or the Hangul block under cursor into Jamo, then reads, describes, or copies the result.
changelog: Added configurable default split scope (block/word/line) and default NVDA+ctrl+h copy gesture.

translations.description: 선택한 한글 텍스트나 커서 아래 한글 블록을 자모로 분해하고, 결과를 읽기·문자 설명·복사로 활용할 수 있게 해줍니다.
translations.changelog: Added configurable default split scope (block/word/line) and default NVDA+ctrl+h copy gesture.
